aws_datasync_location_s3.description: Manages an AWS DataSync S3 Location

s3_config.description: Configuration block containing information for connecting to S3.

subdirectory.description: Prefix to perform actions as source or destination.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of resource tags to assign to the DataSync Location.

id.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DataSync Location.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DataSync Location.
